intro: This document serves as the Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021. It provides comprehensive information for users to effectively utilise the product in their analyses and applications. The manual details the product's characteristics, production methodologies, workflows, and quality assessments. Specifically, it covers the 11-class land cover classification at 10m spatial resolution derived from Sentinel-2 time series data, as well as the accompanying quality layers such as the Confidence Layer, Data Score Layer, and Raster Post-Processing Layer, focusing on their technical specifications and appropriate usage.
